select a.progressId, a.userId, d.itemProjectId, a.dailyProgressId, d.itemProjectName, b.userName, a.dailyProgressDesc, a.progressActualStart, a.progressActualEnd, a.dailyProgressAddtime from gc_daily_progress a left join gc_user b on a.userId = b.userId left join gc_progress c on a.progressId = c.progressId left join gc_item_project d on c.itemProjectId = d.itemProjectId
/*order by creationDate desc*/ limit #{pyl},#{page_size}

select count(1) from gc_daily_progress a left join gc_user b on a.userId = b.userId left join gc_progress c on a.progressId = c.progressId left join gc_item_project d on c.itemProjectId = d.itemProjectId
mapper.insert: insert into gc_daily_progress (progressId,userId,dailyProgressDesc, progressActualStart, progressActualEnd, itemProjectId) values (#{progressId}, (select userId from gc_user where userName = #{userName}), #{dailyProgressDesc},#{progressActualStart},#{progressActualEnd},#{itemProjectId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gc_daily_progress a LEFT JOIN gc_progress b ON a.progressId = b.progressId LEFT JOIN gc_item_project c ON c.itemProjectId = b.itemProjectId WHERE itemProjectName = #{itemProjectName} and a.dailyProgressId = (SELECT max(dailyProgressId) FROM gc_daily_progress)
